title: Modern Downtown Apartment
description: A beautiful modern apartment in the heart of downtown, featuring high ceilings, large windows, and a fully equipped kitchen.

title: Cozy Suburban House
description: Charming family home in a quiet suburban neighborhood, with a spacious backyard, renovated kitchen, and attached garage.

title: Luxury Beachfront Villa
description: Stunning beachfront property with panoramic ocean views, private pool, and high-end finishes throughout.

title: Urban Loft Studio
description: Trendy loft-style studio in a converted warehouse, featuring exposed brick walls, high ceilings, and modern amenities.
